name: CRONUS
description: Cronus Agent is a user-friendly Telegram bot for trading tokens on the Cronos blockchain. It enables users to perform various trades, such as instant buys, sells, limit orders, and automated dollar-cost averaging, primarily through the VVS Finance platform. The project prioritizes secure wallet management and offers a unique benefit where fees generated from bot usage are distributed to $CRONUS token holders, aiming to provide a comprehensive and rewarding trading experience directly within Telegram.
